## Lesson 5: Model Diagnostics

---

In Lesson 5, we will continue to introduce the modeling capabilities of the [`RsNLME`](https://certara.github.io/R-RsNLME/index.html) package and demonstrate how to easily generate `ggplot2` based model diagnostics plots using the [`Certara.Xpose.NLME`](https://certara.github.io/R-Xpose-NLME/index.html) and [`xpose`](https://uupharmacometrics.github.io/xpose/) packages. Finally, we will explore additional plot customization options using `ggplot2` commands.


<br></br>
<br></br>
<br></br>


### Webinar Overview

In the webinar we will cover the following topics:

* Creating a data object (`xpose_data`) in R from RsNLME model output
* Exploring model diagnostics with `xpose` and `Certara.Xpose.NLME` plot commands
* Extending and customizing model diagnostics with `ggplot2`
